      • Card

        public Card(Suit suit,
            Rank rank,
            boolean faceUp)
        Constructs a new card with the specified suit, rank and face visibility.
        Parameters:
        suit - - suit to set as the suit of this card
        rank - - rank to set as the rank of this card
        faceUp - - whether the face of this card should be visible

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        public Card copy()
        Returns a copy of this card.

        A card contains only primitive fields and references to immutable objects. Hence, a shallow copy of this card functions the same as a deep copy. Changes to the returned card will not be reflected in this card, nor will changes to this card be reflected in the returned card.

        Returns:
        a copy of this instance of the Card class
